name: Gardens of Battle
description:
Adventure FPS (WASD + Mouse),  where you can fight giant ants and eventually other creatures in a 3D fantasy world using sword/crossbow (and other cool weapons in the future like the explosive mushroom bazooka, the fire/frost staff and the arrow machinegun, which already work but were not implemented because I didn`t create all the maps).

   You can expect much action.

   I plan to get like 16 maps done or more, depending on how this project goes. There will always be new features in each map, as the complexity grows.

   I really hope you enjoy this game,  let me know your thoughts about it.
